flavorText: An eyeblink later, all that remained of the tree-beast was the breeze of its momentum.

foreignData.flavorText: Einen Augenblick später war die Baumbestie nicht mehr da, nur die Luft war noch unruhig, wo sie sich vorher bewegt hatte.
foreignData.name: Davonwischen
foreignData.text:
Sekundenbruchteil (Solange dieser Zauberspruch sich auf dem Stapel befindet, können Spieler keine Zaubersprüche wirken oder Fähigkeiten aktivieren, die keine Manafähigkeiten sind.)
Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: Un pestañeo más tarde, todo lo que quedaba de la bestia arbórea era la brisa de su impulso.
foreignData.name: Limpiar
foreignData.text:
Fracción de segundo. (Mientras este hechizo esté en la pila, los jugadores no pueden lanzar hechizos o activar habilidades que no sean habilidades de maná.)
Regresa el permanente objetivo a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Un instant plus tard, il ne restait de la bête sylvestre que le courant d'air de son déplacement.
foreignData.name: Essuyage
foreignData.text:
Fraction de seconde (Tant que ce sort est sur la pile, les joueurs ne peuvent pas lancer de sorts ou activer de capacités qui ne sont pas des capacités de mana.)
Renvoyez un permanent ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Un attimo dopo, tutto ciò che rimaneva della bestia-albero era la brezza del suo slancio.
foreignData.name: Ripulire
foreignData.text:
Battibaleno (Fintanto che questa magia è in pila, i giocatori non possono lanciare magie o attivare abilità che non siano abilità di mana.)
Fai tornare un permanente bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: 瞬き一つの後で残ったのは、樹の猛獣が巻き起こした風だけだった。
foreignData.name: 拭い捨て
foreignData.text:
刹那（この呪文がスタック上にあるかぎり、プレイヤーは呪文を唱えられず、マナ能力でない起動型能力を起動できない。）
パーマネント１つを対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: Num piscar de olhos tudo que sobrou da besta-árvore foi o vento de seu ímpeto.
foreignData.name: Limpar
foreignData.text:
Fração de segundo (Enquanto esta mágica estiver na pilha, os jogadores não poderão conjurar mágicas ou ativar habilidades que não sejam habilidades de mana.)
Devolva a permanente alvo para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Через мгновение от древесного существа осталось лишь дыхание времени.
foreignData.name: Стирание
foreignData.text:
Мгновение ока (Пока это заклинание находится в стеке, игроки не могут разыгрывать заклинания или активировать способности, которые не являются мана-способностями.)
Верните целевой перманент в руку его владельца.

foreignData.flavorText: 这树身怪兽一眨眼便没了踪影，只留下在那片刻的轻风。
foreignData.name: 扫拂
foreignData.text:
转瞬（只要此咒语在堆叠上，牌手便不能施放咒语或起动不是法术力异能的异能。）
将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。

foreignData.flavorText: 這樹身怪獸一眨眼便沒了蹤影，只留下在那片刻的輕風。
foreignData.name: 掃拂
foreignData.text:
轉瞬（只要此咒語在堆疊上，玩家便不能施放咒語或起動不是魔法力異能的異能。）
將目標永久物移回其擁有者手上。

name: Wipe Away
originalText:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Players still get priority while a card with split second is on the stack; their options are just limited to mana abilities and certain special actions.
Players may turn face-down creatures face up while a spell with split second is on the stack.

Split second doesn’t stop triggered abilities from triggering, such as that of Chalice of the Void. If one does, its controller puts it on the stack and chooses targets for it, if any. Those abilities will resolve as normal.
Casting a spell with split second won’t affect spells and abilities that are already on the stack.
If the resolution of a triggered ability involves casting a spell, that spell can’t be cast if a spell with split second is on the stack.
After a spell with split second resolves (or otherwise leaves the stack), players may again cast spells and activate abilities before the next object on the stack resolves.

text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
